MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer, affecting properties in Kirkcolm and surrounding area.  Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1AM via generators. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.05AM on 25th November 2020.
